Episodes.Title: Last Day
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Gursimran Sandhu
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Across the globe, strange and unexplainable events begin to unfold. A small-town sheriff senses something bigger is at play.

Episodes.Title: Crash
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Gursimran Sandhu
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Amid chaos, Aneesha makes a difficult decision for the sake of her family. Trevante, a Navy SEAL, investigates a distress call with his team.

Episodes.Title: Orion
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Gursimran Sandhu
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Mitsuki takes desperate measures, determined to uncover the truth. Caspar and Jamila discover just how dire their situation is.

Episodes.Title: The King Is Dead
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Gursimran Sandhu
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Trevante fears the worst until a locator beacon gives him hope. Mitsuki finds an ally in the most unexpected place.

Episodes.Title: Going Home
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Gursimran Sandhu
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: The President of the United States gives an urgent global address in an attempt to prepare the world for what lies ahead.

Episodes.Title: Home Invasion
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Andrew Baldwin
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: In shock from the president's speech, Aneesha rushes back to her family only to find their safe haven--and their lives--threatened.

Episodes.Title: Hope
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Andrew Baldwin
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Mitsuki commandeers a satellite station, hoping to make contact with outer space. Caspar reveals a strange secret he thinks is related to the invasion.

Episodes.Title: Contact
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Andrew Baldwin
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Trevante's plane lands, but his journey home is just beginning. Caspar and Jamila brave London's streets, trying to make sense of his secret.

Episodes.Title: Full of Stars
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Andrew Baldwin
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: Mitsuki is determined to contact the Hoshi 12 before it's too late, as the military detains the Maliks and Caspar takes a risk that may kill him.

Episodes.Title: First Day
Episodes.Writer: Simon Kinberg, David Weil, Andrew Baldwin
Episodes.Actors: Golshifteh Farahani, Shamier Anderson, Shioli Kutsuna
Episodes.Plot: The world, still reeling from global destruction, faces a new and unforeseen dawn.
